summary: The diff only modifies project_state.json to record the feature request as 'pending'. No actual frontend source files were changed to replace £/GBP with $/USD. All acceptance criteria for REQ-1 remain unimplemented.

missing_requirements.requirement: Replace all British Pound (£) currency symbols and GBP formatting with US Dollar ($) formatting throughout the frontend (ProductsPage, ProductCard, ProductDetailPage, Cart, Checkout, Admin analytics, MyOrderCard, OrderList, and any other price display).
missing_requirements.reason: The diff contains no changes to any frontend source files. Only project_state.json was modified to mark the request as 'pending', meaning none of the currency display changes have been implemented.
